name: load-request-from-cwd-or-npm
description: Load `request` module from either CWD or npm CLI directory
author: Shinnosuke Watanabe (https://github.com/shinnn)

scripts.test: node test/test.js && node test/test-broken-npm.js && node test/test-no-npm.js
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --dir=coverage/test test/test.js && istanbul cover --dir=coverage/test-broken-npm test/test-broken-npm.js && istanbul cover --dir=coverage/test-no-npm test/test-no-npm.js && istanbul report
